summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of ForgeVoice Studio application. Tested all authentication flows, role-based access control, navigation, dashboard functionality, and API integrations.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart width/height being -1, suggesting responsive sizing issues

passed_tests: Backend API - All 20 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Admin login flow - redirects to dashboard correctly
Client login flow - redirects to dashboard correctly
Invalid login - shows error message appropriately
Signup flow - form fields and navigation working
Logout flow - redirects to login page
Sidebar navigation - all 13 nav items present and functional
Admin panel access - only visible and accessible to admin users
Client admin restriction - clients correctly redirected from /admin
Protected routes - unauthenticated users redirected to login
Overview page - stat cards, charts, and data table loading
Role-based navigation - admin nav hidden for client users
Dashboard data integration - API data displays correctly
User dropdown menu - Profile, Settings, Logout options working
Header functionality - breadcrumbs, search, notifications, user info
